intent_atoms.description: Create NavigationSplitScaffold wrapper pattern that integrates NavigationSplitViewKit.NavigationModel with FoundationUI's design system for cross-platform navigation.
Core API implemented with ViewBuilder support.
Design token compliance (spacing, colors, animation, typography).
6+ SwiftUI previews including ISO Inspector reference.
All layout constants use DS tokens (no magic numbers).
Use a generic struct over Sidebar/Content/Detail view types.
Environment key for navigation state propagation.
Select Task 241 over Bug #232 and Task A7 based on priority, dependencies, and strategic value.
Task 241 selected because all dependencies satisfied (Task 240 complete).
Task selection follows rules in DOCS/COMMANDS/SELECT_NEXT.md and DOCS/RULES/03_Next_Task_Selection.md.

functional_units.name: NavigationSplitScaffold API
functional_units.description: Generic SwiftUI wrapper struct that integrates NavigationSplitViewKit’s NavigationModel with FoundationUI design system, exposing a view builder interface for sidebar, content, and detail views.

functional_units.name: EnvironmentKey for NavigationState
functional_units.description: An EnvironmentKey that propagates the navigation state throughout the view hierarchy, enabling child views to access and modify navigation context.

functional_units.name: DesignToken Integration
functional_units.description: All layout constants within NavigationSplitScaffold are derived from FoundationUI design system tokens (spacing, colors, animation, typography), ensuring zero magic numbers.

functional_units.name: Unit & Integration Tests
functional_units.description: A suite of 35+ automated tests covering core API behavior, environment propagation, token usage, and platform-specific functionality across iOS, iPadOS, macOS.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Previews
functional_units.description: Six comprehensive SwiftUI previews demonstrating typical use cases, including an ISO Inspector mockup and platform comparison variants.

functional_units.name: DocC Documentation
functional_units.description: Full DocC API reference and usage guide for NavigationSplitScaffold, providing 100% coverage of public interfaces.
